fields.title: Ice Cream
method: Separate the egg yolks and egg whites.
Whip the egg whites until stiff.
Lightly whip the egg yolks, sugar, vanilla extract, and any liquid flavourings together.
Whip the egg yolk mixture lightly into the whipped cream.
Carefully fold together the cream mixture, whipped egg whites, and any solid flavourings.

fields.title: Lamb Meatballs with Harissa Dressing
method: Salt the cucumber and place in a sieve atop kitchen towel.
Combine the lemon zest, garlic, breadcrumbs, and mince into ~20 meatballs.
Put meatballs in the oven, on a baking tray, at 200C for 15-20 minutes.
Combine harissa paste, olive oil, lemon juice, and mint into a marinade.
Once meatballs are cooked, toss in marinade.
Serve meatballs atop couscous and topped with natural yoghurt and cucumber.

fields.title: Ricotta Gnocchi
method: Remove as much moisture from the ricotta as possible.
Sift flour into a large bowl.
Add all ingredients into the flour and mix until combined.
Gently knead dough until it comes together.
Roll the dough out into a long sausage shape.
Boil in salted water for ~2 minutes.

fields.title: Chicken and Mushroom Pie
method: Cut the chicken into bite-sized pieces.
Remove the chicken from the pan.
Add the mushrooms, thyme, and onion to the bacon.
Stir in the flour until combined.
Stir in the stock and milk
Add the chicken back into the pan and simmer for 30 minutes.
Roll out the dough and line a deep pie dish. Enough dough should be left for a lid.
Top the pie with a pastry lid. Ensure the lid is bonded to the rest of the pastry and an air vent is cut into the top.
Optionally, apply an egg wash to the exposed pastry.

fields.title: Beef Casserole
method: Chop all vegetables into large chunks.
Mix in stock cubes, tomato puree, and worcestershire sauce.
Boil water separately then add to the dish.
Place lid on dish and put in a 140C oven for 2.5 hours.
Make and add dumplings to the casserole.
Bake for a further 30 minutes without the lid.

fields.title: Liver and Chorizo on Toast
method: Fry chicken livers until mostly cooked. Break up liver using utensil as it cooks.
Add garlic and onion to liver and cook until softened.
In another pan, Toast bread with olive oil.
Serve topping on bread once liquid thickens.

fields.title: Sticky BBQ Chicken
method: Mix together all ingredients except for chicken thighs.
Spread a thin layer of sauce into ceramic dish.
Place chicken in dish, skin-side down.
Top with 75% of the remaining sauce.
Bake in a 200C oven for 20 minutes.
Take out of the oven, flip chicken, add remaining sauce to skin side.
Return to oven for another 20 minutes.

fields.title: Italian Crackslaw
method: Fry cabbage in rendered beef fat until soft
Toss cabbage with vinegar, onion powder, salt, and pepper over heat.
Add all ingredients back into pan and mix together over heat.
Serve with sour cream or mayonnaise.

fields.title: Eggs in Purgatory
method: In a lidded casserole dish or large saucepan, heat cherry tomatoes with olive oil until soft.
Continue to cook with lid on, until egg whites cook.
Serve on toasted bread or eat as a standalone dish.

fields.title: Cast Iron Pizza
method: Add yeast and to water, leave to bloom.
If bloomed, continue. Else, retry with new yeast.
Mix together until no clumps remain.
Leave for flour to hydrate for 15 minutes.
Knead dough for about 10 minutes and form into a ball.
Lightly cover dough in olive oil and leave in an oiled bowl to rise at room temperate until doubled in size or overnight in the fridge.
Place dough into a cold and oiled cast iron pan and lightly stretch out.
Repeat resting and stretching until the dough holds to the shape of the pan.
If using high-moisture mozzarella, drain and press between kitchen paper until drier.
Put pan on medium-high heat on hob until base becomes firm (About 3-5 minutes).
Place into oven heated as high as possible for 10-15 minutes.

fields.title: Bacon and Leek Tart
method: If not pre-rolled, roll out pastry into the size of a baking tray.
Spread soft cheese evenly over the pastry.
Fold edges over to form a crust.
Brown cheese under grill if desired.

fields.title: Cookies
method: Soften butter in microwave for ~15 seconds.
Mix in egg and vanilla extract until smooth.
Mix in sifted flour and bicarbonate of soda until consistent.
Spoon onto a baking tray lined with baking paper.

fields.title: Cast Iron Pineapple Upside-Down Cake
method: Melt butter in cast iron pan.
Sprinkle brown sugar over base of pan evenly.
Drain pineapple slices from tin. Reserve 60ml of pineapple juice.
Arrange pineapple slices across base of pan.
Place a cherry (Halved if preferred) inside each of the pineapple centres.
Gently heat pineapple juice in a saucepan.
Beat egg yolks with a whisk until homogeneous.
Slowly add caster sugar to yolks while continuing to whisk.
Slowly whisk heated pineapple juice into yolk mixture.
Whisk in remaining dry ingredients into yolk mixture.
In a separate bowl, whip egg whites until stiff.
Carefully fold egg whites into batter.
Let cool in pan for at least 30 minutes before flipping onto a plate/board.

fields.title: Turkey and Chickpea Burgers
method: Crush chickpeas into a rough paste.
Form into patties slightly larger than the desired final size.
Cook in an oiled frying pan for ~5 minutes on each side.
Serve on burger buns just like any other burger.

fields.title: Pork Belly Braise
method: If not already, cut pork belly into slices.
Liberally season the pork belly with salt and pepper.
Sear all sides of the pork belly in a casserole dish - ensure the fat is particularly browned.
Add all vegetables and fennel seeds into the casserole dish and cook until beginning to soften.
Add lentils for the final minute.
Pour in the stock until the lentils are covered.
Cook in a 160C oven, covered, for 45 minutes.
Return to oven uncovered for a further 40 minutes.
Top up with more stock if it runs dry.
Re-glaze the pork frequently while cooking.

fields.title: Thai Green Fish Curry
method: In a large saucepan, lightly fry the curry paste, beans, coriander, and chilli.
Pour in the stock and fish sauce.
Add the fish and simmer until cooked through.
Stir in the coconut milk (cream for a thicker sauce), lemon, and spinach.

fields.title: Toad in the Hole
method: Cook sausages in an oiled ceramic rectangular baking dish in a 200C oven for 15 minutes.
While cooking, whisk together flour, eggs, milk, and salt.
Immediately from the oven, pour the batter evenly over the sausages.
Return to the oven for a further 25 minutes.

fields.title: Pork Belly Bao
method: De-seed (If desired) and slice the chillies.
To a very large saucepan - add the chillies, ginger, orange, garlic, star anise, cinnamon, chicken stock, and pork belly.
Cover and simmer as low as possible for 2 hours.
After 30 minutes of simmering, mix together the flour, yeast, salt, baking powder, sugar, water, milk, and cream until it forms a dough.
Oil the dough ball and its container lightly.
Roll each miniature ball into an oval.
Lightly oil the side facing up and fold over on itself.
Let uncooked buns prove for 20 more minutes.
Lightly fry the pork in an oiled frying pan until browned.
Remove any excessive oil in the pan.
Add honey, soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, and 100ml of the broth.
Cook until the pork mixture reaches a saucy consistency.
Arrange three bao buns onto a small plate lined with baking paper in a single layer.
Place plate into broth saucepan atop a tall bowl.
Steam buns in the saucepan for 20 minutes.
Repeat the steaming process for remaining buns.
Fill buns with pork and sprinkle filling with sesame seeds to serve.

fields.title: Italian Stuff on Toasted Bread
method: Pre-heat a pan large enough to accommodate all bread slices (ideally a cast iron pan).
Add a small amount of olive oil to the pan.
Drizzle olive oil onto 1 side of the bread.
Toast the bread, oil side down, until golden.
Repeat for second side of bread.
Slice mozzarella and tomato into equal numbers of slices to top the bread.
Arrange stacks of toppings onto bread: tomato, mozzarella, then a basil leaf.
Finish with a drizzle of olive oil and salt and pepper.

fields.title: Chicken Kebabs
method: Mix together the soy sauce, olive oil, oregano, lemon juice, and garlic.
Cut up chicken breasts, pepper, and onion into cubes/squares.
Optionally, marinade for up to 24 hours.
Arrange onto skewers in a repeating pattern of pepper, onion, and chicken.
Suspend skewers from each end bake at 200C for 25 minutes, flipping halfway through.

fields.title: Basic Curry
method: Cut up the chicken into pieces.
Cut up the onion into large squares.
Fry the chicken in a large frying pan until almost cooked.
Add the curry powder to the chicken and cook until fragrant.
Before the spices burn, add the chopped tomatoes and garlic.
Cook until the sauce is beginning to thicken.
Serve on rice, topped with coriander leaf.

fields.title: Vegetarian Duck Pancakes
ingredients: 3 Tablespoons Hoisin Sauce (Plus more to serve)
method: Lightly fry the spring onions and garlic.
Add in jackfruit, five spice, sesame oil, rice wine vinegar, and hoisin sauce.
Continue to cook for ~10 minutes whilst breaking up jackfruit.
Lay jackfruit mixture flat on a baking tray and cook in the oven for 20 minutes at 200C.
While jackfruit is in the oven, slice cucumber and remaining spring onions into sticks.

fields.title: Chicken and Bacon Cheesy Pasta
method: If too dry, add additional pasta water.

fields.title: Cornflake Cakes
method: Combine and melt the chocolate, golden syrup, and butter in a double boiler.

fields.title: Aubergine Bake
method: In a large baking dish, mix together the passata, pesto, cream, vinegar, herbs, and half of the olive oil.
Cut the tips off of the aubergine and halve length-ways.
Cut 3 v-shaped slits across each aubergine half.
Stuff the slits with slices of mozzarella and slices of pepper.
Drizzle aubergine with remaining olive oil.
Add halved cherry tomatoes around the aubergine.
Eat as-is or serve on toasted bread.

fields.title: Lasagne
method: Add passata, garlic, basil, and worcestershire sauce.
Simmer for ~10 minutes until slightly thickened.
If using dried lasagne sheets, soak sheets in cold salted water.
Slowly stream milk into butter/flour mixture.
Continue to heat and whisk white sauce until thickened.
Build up lasagne in a lasagne dish in layers of: meat-sauce, lasagne sheets, white sauce.

fields.title: Cast Iron Giant Cookie
method: Melt butter in cast iron pan.
Dissolve both sugars into the butter.
Remove from heat and let stand for 15-30 minutes.
Whisk in eggs and vanilla extract.
Stir in flour, bicarbonate of soda, and salt.
Chop chocolate and other toppings into large chunks and stir into mixture.

fields.title: Chicken Stock
method: Throw all ingredients into a large pan.
Skim and strain through a colander.

fields.title: Korean Stir-Fried Chicken
method: Cut up the chicken into pieces.
Mix together the chicken, gochujang, soy sauce, sugar, pepper, and sesame oil.
In a frying pan or wok, cook the chicken mixture.
Peel and crush the garlic and ginger.
Cut the spring onion into large diagonal wedges.
Add the remaining ingredients to the mixture for the final 5 minutes.

fields.title: Kimchi Pancake
method: Roughly chop spring onions and kimchi (if not already).
Pour into and fry in a frying pan with oil for ~3 minutes each side.

fields.title: Harissa Sea Bass with Griddled Vegetables
method: Cut courgette into ribbons using a vegetable peeler.
Cut pepper and onion into large wedges.
Fry vegetables in a hot (Ideally griddled) pan until soft and charred.
Rub harissa, salt, and pepper over sea bass.
Grill sea bass under high heat for ~5 minutes.

fields.title: Rosti
method: Peel and grate potatoes and onion.
Drain as much water out by squeezing through a tea towel.
Firmly pack mixture into a large oiled saucepan.

fields.title: Italian Meatballs and Sauce
method: Mix together mince, breadcrumbs, egg, 1 tablespoon oregano, 1 tablespoon basil, and 1/2 teaspoon salt.
Evenly fry in an oiled frying pan until cooked through.
Remove meatballs from frying pan, but leave the oil.
Drain some oil if there is too much.
Cook on low heat until beginning to thicken.
Return meatballs to the frying pan and continue cooking until sauce is at desired thickness.
Serve on either spaghetti or in bread rolls.

fields.title: Lamb and Apricot Tagine
method: In a casserole dish, fry the onions.
Once mostly fried, add spices and garlic.
Mix whilst bringing to the boil.
Add lid and cook in a 200C oven for 1 hour.
Stir, remove lid, and cook for a further 30 minutes.

fields.title: Sourdough Starter Crumpet
method: Heat a small frying pan containing 1/2 tablespoon olive oil.
Pour sourdough starter into centre of pan.
Cook until the top edges begins to solidify and the crumpet slides freely on the pan.
Sprinkle rosemary and salt onto the top of the crumpet.
Lightly drizzle with remaining olive oil.

fields.title: Peach Galette
ingredients: 2 Tablespoons Light Brown or Demerara Sugar
method: Dump all flour, butter, sugar, and salt onto a large chopping board.
Cut ingredients together until butter is crumb-sized.
Drain peaches into a sieve, reserving the liquid.
Add 50ml of peach liquid to mixture.
Bring mixture together into a dough without heating it up too much with hands.
Wrap dough in clingfilm and rest in the freezer for 30 minutes.
Sprinkle peaches with sugar to desired sweetness and leave whilst dough is cooling.
Roll dough out into a circle of 1/2cm thickness.
Arrange peaches into centre of dough, leaving about 1/3 of the radius uncovered.
Fold edge towards centre along the entire circumference.
Liberally apply egg-wash to the exposed dough.
Allow to cool for at least 15 minutes before cutting.

fields.title: Puff Pastry Cinnamon Rolls
method: Roll out pastry into a rectangle of 0.5cm thickness.
Mix together brown sugar, caster sugar, and cinnamon.
Brush melted butter evenly across the pastry.
Spread sugar mixture evenly across the pastry.
Place flat on a baking tray lined with baking paper.
Make glaze by mixing remaining ingredients.

fields.title: Schnitzel
method: Mix together flour, paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Bread meat by coating in flour mixture, then eggs, then breadcrumbs.
Shallow fry in a deep frying pan for ~5 minutes each side until golden brown.
Cool on a wire rack above kitchen roll.

fields.title: Seasoned Sushi Rice
method: Add rice to lidded-saucepan with 330ml of water.
Leave to stand, with the lid on, for 30 minutes.

fields.title: Orange Lamb Stir-Fry
method: Fry lamb mince in a large saucepan or wok.
Add garlic, cumin seeds, coriander, and onion.
Continue cooking until onion has began to soften.

fields.title: Pancakes
method: Cook in a small frying pan for ~3 minutes, flipping halfway through.
Add toppings of choice (e.g. banana, chocolate spread, honey, or ice cream).

fields.title: Chicken and Chorizo Traybake
method: Add Chicken, tomatoes, chorizo, peppers, and chilli flakes to a large roasting dish.
Mix together remaining olive oil, lemon juice, and basil.

fields.title: Enchiladas
method: Mix together all seasonings, flour, and passata.
Add 3/4 of the sauce to chicken.
Add 1/2 of the cheese to the mixture.
Simmer until cheese is fully melted and sauce begins to thicken.
Distribute filling among all tortillas evenly.
Fold tortillas around filling using excess sauce to seal the end shut.
Bake at 180C until cheese beginning to brown.

fields.title: Spinach and Feta Pie
method: Remove mixture from heat and sprinkle in feta chunks.
Lightly mix mixture together with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
Roll the pastry out such that it can line a large baking dish with enough off-cuts for a lid.
Remove excess pastry from edges leaving enough overhang to help seal lid onto it.
Roll out offcuts into a lid.
Seal lid and tidy any overhang.
Cut several small steam vents into lid.

fields.title: Pork Larb
method: De-glaze with fish sauce, lemon juice, and juice from 1 lime.
Add all remaining ingredients (including any lime rinds) except for lettuce.
Lightly cook until all ingredients hot.

fields.title: Oatmeal Raisin Cookies
method: Soak raisins in warm water for at least 10 minutes.
Cream together butter and both sugars.
Mix in egg, vanilla extract, and molasses.
In a separate bowl, mix together the flour, bicarbonate of soda, cinnamon, and salt.
Combine both bowls to form a dough.
Fold raisins and oats into dough.
Form dough into balls using ~2 tablespoons of dough each.
Bake on a baking tray at 180C for ~12 minutes.

fields.title: Baguette Pizza
method: Cut baguette to the length of a baking tray.
Mix together BBQ sauce and tomato puree.

fields.title: Winged Dumplings
method: Arrange dumplings on an oiled non-stick frying pan as a spiral.
Bring up to a medium heat.
Cover with lid and fry until browned.

fields.title: Tuna Pasta Bake
method: Whisk together, on heat, for ~3 minutes.
Mix together all ingredients except for remaining cheese.

fields.title: Chocolate Coconut Tart
method: Mix together flour, sugar, salt, and coconut oil into a breadcrumb texture.
Line a tart pan with mixture.
Blind bake crust at 180C for 25 minutes.
Add all remaining ingredients except for the chocolate into a microwavable container.
Add enough chocolate such that the total volume reaches 500ml.
Gently heat the mixture in the microwave until chocolate melts fully.
Pour ganache into crust and let cool fully before serving.

fields.title: Meatloaf
method: Mix together mince, onion, garlic, egg, parsley, panko, milk, oregano, basil, 1/2 teaspoon pepper, 1.5 teaspoons salt, and 100g ketchup.
Press mixture into a loaf tin lined with baking paper.
Glaze top of meatloaf with sauce.
Return to oven for 15 additional minutes.

fields.title: Burritos
ingredients: Meat Filling of Choice (e.g. Pulled Pork/Chicken, Spiced Mince Beef)
method: Fry onions and peppers until browned.
Season onions and peppers with fajita seasoning.
Lay down four squares of foil.
Lay one tortilla on each of the foil squares.
Place burritos on a baking tray.

fields.title: Calzone
method: Knead together flour, milk/water, 1 teaspoon salt, 1 teaspoon sugar, and yeast.
oregano, basil, 1 teaspoon salt, sugar, and olive oil.
Spread a layer of sauce over all of the dough.
Arrange fillings on half of the dough.
Top fillings with cheese and more sauce.
Fold dough over fillings and seal.
Bake at maximum oven temperature for ~10 minutes.
Return to oven until golden brown.

fields.title: Apple Galette
method: Knead together flour, milk/water, 1 teaspoon sugar, 1 teaspoon salt, and yeast.
Line baking tray with baking paper.
Sprinkle ~2 tablespoons of sugar evenly across the paper.
Spread dough out to the size of the baking tray.
Distribute chunks of butter across galette.

fields.title: Banana Bread
method: Line loaf tin with baking paper.
Soften butter in microwave for ~5 seconds.
Mash banana in a mixing bowl.
Add all other ingredients to bowl.

fields.title: Chocolate Chilli
method: Finely chop onion, pepper, chilli, and garlic.
Fry chopped ingredients in leftover beef fat.
Reintroduce beef alongside cumin, paprika, oregano, sugar, drained kidney beans, and chopped tomatoes.
Simmer with lid ajar for ~30 minutes until thickened.
Add salt and pepper to taste.

fields.title: Grilled Cheese
method: Spread mayonnaise across entirely of one side of each slice of bread.
Arrange cheese on dry side of flipped bread.
Sprinkle garlic powder, paprika, and pepper evenly across cheese.
Top with other slice of bread so that both mayonnaise sides are facing outwards.
Melt butter in a frying pan.
Fry each side until golden brown.

fields.title: Baked Salmon
method: Grease a sheet of foil with some of the olive oil.
Place salmon fillet on foil, skin-side down.
Drizzle fillet with lemon juice and remaining olive oil.

fields.title: Burgers
method: Mix all ingredients together in a large bowl.
Cook in a frying pan until browned on both sides (~10 minutes).

fields.title: Tuna Pasta
method: Leave pasta to cool for 4-5 minutes.

fields.title: Custard
method: In a saucepan, mix together egg yolks, sugar, cornflour, and vanilla extract.
Gently heat milk until barely steaming.
Slowly stream milk into saucepan whilst constantly whisking.
Once all milk incorporated, heat custard gently on hob whilst whisking.

fields.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
method: If serving with pasta, add 2-3 tablespoons of pasta water.

fields.title: Carrot Fritters
method: Fry until browned on each side.

fields.title: Baked Feta and Tomato Pasta
method: Add garlic, tomatoes, feta, and olive oil to a baking dish.
Add 100ml of pasta water to dish.

fields.title: Black Bean Burgers
method: Finely dice pepper, onion, and garlic.
Lightly fry pepper, onion, and garlic until softened.
Place patties onto a baking tray lined with baking paper.

fields.title: Falafel Wrap
method: Spread houmous over middle of tortilla.
Mix together yoghurt, mint, olive oil, salt, and pepper.

fields.title: Korean Seabass
method: Pat seabass dry with kitchen roll.
Marinate seabass with 1.5 tablespoons of gochujang and 1 tablespoon of soy sauce.
Optionally, refrigerate for up to 12 hours.
Fry for ~3 minutes on each side.
Cook for 3-5 minutes until sauce is hot.

fields.title: Rock Cakes
method: Mix together flour, sugar, and baking powder.
Rub butter into mixture until it reaches a breadcrumb consistency.
Place golf-ball-sized dough balls onto a lined baking tray.

fields.title: Katsu Curry
method: Lightly fry chopped ingredients in a saucepan.
Add stock, curry powder, garam masala, soy sauce, honey, and 1 tablespoon of flour.

fields.title: Garlic Bread
method: Mix together flour, yeast, salt, sugar and water.
Mix garlic powder and olive oil into butter.
Brush some butter mixture over bread.
Brush more butter mixture over bread.

fields.title: Baked Alaska
method: Mix together butter mixture, eggs, flour, and baking powder.
Line and grease a cake tin.
Whisk egg whites whilst slowly adding remaining sugar until stiff.
Arrange ice cream onto sponge, leaving a 2cm margin from the edge.
Encase the ice cream with meringue.
Leave in freezer for at least 2 hours.
Place on a lined baking tray.

fields.title: Fajitas
method: Continue to cook until fully cooked.

fields.title: Pumpkin Pie
method: Mix in ~2 tablespoons of cold water until dough forms.
Grease and line a ~20cm flan tin.
Add pastry to tin - do not trim edges.
Let cool for at least 30 minutes before cutting.

fields.title: Eggy Bread
method: Fry on each side until browned.

fields.title: Korean Pork and Vegetables
method: Place pork in freezer for about 2 hours.
Mix together all remaining ingredients into a sauce.

fields.title: Chocolate Chip Cookie Cups
method: Soften butter in microwave for ~15 seconds.
Mix in egg and vanilla extract until smooth.
Mix in sifted flour and bicarbonate of soda until consistent.
Spoon mixture into ramekins until 1/4 full.
Spread a thick layer of chocolate spread on top.
Top with another layer of mixture until ramekin is 3/4 full.

fields.title: Butternut Squash Risotto
method: Toss butternut squash in olive oil.
Arrange butternut squash in a single layer on baking trays.
Lightly fry rice, onions, and garlic in butter.
Add stock in small quantities until rice cooked.

fields.title: BBQ Pulled Chicken
method: Deeply score chicken breasts several times.
Place chicken breasts into baking dish.
Cook in over at 180C for 45 minutes.
Shred chicken using two forks or an electric hand mixer.

fields.title: Prawn and Chorizo Tagliatelle
method: Add basil leaves shortly before serving.

fields.title: Sausage and Bean Soup
method: Brown sausages in a saucepan in olive oil.
Add shallots and carrots until starting to soften.
Add all remaining ingredients other than cabbage and parsley.

fields.title: Mug Cake
method: Add butter to mug and microwave until melted.

fields.title: American-Style Blueberry Pancakes
method: If frozen, lightly thaw berries in microwave.
Cook in a small frying pan for ~3 minutes, flipping halfway through.
Add toppings of choice (e.g. banana, chocolate spread, honey, or ice cream).

fields.title: Lemon Butter Cod
method: Oven bake cod at 180C for 20 minutes.
Drizzle sauce over fish once served.

fields.title: Apple Crumble
method: In a large bowl, mix together flour and 110g of caster sugar.
Toss remaining caster sugar into apples.
Sprinkle flour mixture over top of apples.
Run fork lightly over flour mixture to create shallow ridges.
Sprinkle oats and demerara sugar over crumble.

fields.title: Teriyaki Sauce
method: Bring to a boil until thickened.
